title: Fox and MSNBC reveal dueling views of al Qaeda leader's death
description: From Fox News' Tucker Carlson to MSNBC's Rachel Maddow, here's how hosts from liberal and conservative media framed their coverage of the killing of al Qaeda's leader Ayman al-Zawahiri.

title: Dogs in Tokyo cool down with wearable fans
description: Sweet Mommy, a Tokyo-based maternity clothing apparel company, is making wearable fans for pets. The battery-powered fan is designed to help pets stay cool as Japan faces unusually high temperatures.

title: Look inside the Situation Room as the US planned Zawahiri strike
description: CNN's Alex Marquardt breaks down the US's planning and execution of a targeted drone strike against al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri.

title: What you need to know about Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's expected visit to Taiwan has resulted in stern warnings from Beijing and mounting concerns in Washington.

title: China says the visit, the first by a US House speaker in 25 years, would have an 'egregious political impact'
description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi landed in Taipei on Tuesday, marking a significant show of support for Taiwan despite China's threats of retaliation over the visit.

title: New Webb telescope image reveals the chaotic Cartwheel galaxy
description: The James Webb Space Telescope has peered through cosmic dust to reveal new details and a stunning image of a rare type of galaxy.

title: Analysis: Pelosi's Taiwan visit risks creating greater instability between the US and China
description:
• Pelosi expected to visit Taiwan, officials say
• What you need to know about Pelosi's expected visit to Taiwan

title: Uber's business is booming even with high gas prices and inflation
description: Even higher gas prices and soaring inflation aren't slowing down Uber's rebound from the worst days of the pandemic.

title: Snorkeler 'bitten' in suspected shark attack in UK's Cornish coast
description: A snorkeler has sustained a leg injury after apparently being "bitten by a shark" while snorkeling off the coast of Cornwall in southwestern England.

title: Taco Bell is bringing back Mexican Pizza
description: Taco Bell's Mexican Pizza is finally returning to menus following a three-month absence.

title: BP profits triple as UK customers face even higher energy bills
description: UK energy giant BP reported its biggest quarterly profit in 14 years on Tuesday — a development that's likely to stir anxieties around eye-watering energy bills that have driven a cost of living crisis in the country.

title: Late NBA great Bill Russell 'leaves a giant example for us all,' says Kareem Abdul-Jabbar
description: Six-time NBA champion Kareem Abdul-Jabbar has paid tribute to the late Bill Russell, his mentor and friend who he said "leaves a giant example for us all."

title: Images show Kabul house where al Qaeda chief is believed to have been killed by US strike
Nancy Pelosi lands in Taiwan as China warns of 'egregious political impact'
Waves of extreme heat traverse the US this week
description: Two rounds of excessive heat will grip a large part of the country this week, impacting people from the Plains to the Midwest and the Northeast.

title: Stretching, range of motion and aerobic exercise all slow cognitive decline, study says
description: Cheer up couch potatoes! Regular stretching and balance and range of motion exercises are as good as aerobic exercise in slowing the progression of mild cognitive decline, a new study has found.

title: Brittney Griner trial: Lawyer predicts verdict will be "very soon"
description: The Russian trial of WNBA star Brittney Griner will continue Tuesday as US officials attempt to negotiate a prisoner swap for her release.

title: Images show house where al Qaeda chief is believed to have been killed by US strike
description: •  Opinion: Charisma-free al-Zawahiri was running al-Qaeda into the ground

title: American dentist and big-game hunter found guilty of killing wife on African safari
description: An American dentist and big-game hunter was found guilty of murder in the shooting death of his wife on an African safari.

title: 'My life will never, ever be the same.' Court hears of lives shattered in Parkland shooter death penalty trial
description: It's been 1,630 days since Linda Beigel Schulman spoke to her son Scott Beigel, a geography teacher killed in the 2018 high school shooting in Parkland, Florida, as he ushered students to safety in his classroom.

title: TikTok's ties to China are once again under fire in Washington. Here's why
description: Two years after then-President Donald Trump said he would ban TikTok in the United States through an executive order, the short-form video platform is once again under scrutiny in Washington. And the underlying issue remains largely the same: TikTok's ties to China through its parent company, Bytedance.

title: More curbs to air traffic in London and Amsterdam
description: In the latest moves aimed at curbing air travel chaos, Amsterdam's Schiphol Airport has extended its summer passenger cap and British Airways has suspended short-haul ticket sales from London's Heathrow Airport.

title: Access to experimental monkeypox treatment remains uneven, doctors say
description: A drug is available for monkeypox patients who have or who are at risk of severe disease, but doctors say they continue to face challenges getting access to it.

title: At least 24 dead in Uganda floods, officials say
description: Floods in parts of eastern Uganda resulting from torrential rains have killed at least 24 people, the government and Uganda Red Cross said.

title: Convicted US Capitol rioter's son says he 'absolutely' agrees with father's sentence
description: The son of Guy Reffitt, the first US Capitol riot defendant to go to trial rather than take a plea agreement, said his father "absolutely" deserves the 87-month prison sentence that was handed down Monday.

title: The summer stock rally could produce more pain
description: Investors are anxious, tired and gloomy as they digest the worst start to the year since 1970 and try to chart a path forward. But you wouldn't know it from watching major stock indexes.

title: Nuclear sky hotel not impossible, video creator says
description: A fantasy video showing a gigantic flying hotel that can stay in the sky for years on end has caused a sensation online, despite being beyond the realms of current technology and in breach of the laws of physics.

title: Tito's is trolling canned cocktails with $20 empty cans
description: Basically everyone else is doing it, so you'd think it would be tempting for Tito's Handmade Vodka to enter the canned cocktail craze. Instead, they're doing the complete opposite.

title: Israel's Prime Minister makes rare allusion to country's nuclear weapons arsenal
description: Israel's Prime Minister Yair Lapid made a rare allusion to the country's widely suspected nuclear arsenal during a speech on Monday.

title: This 2-year-old is unable to walk. He's one of 6 million on the brink of starvation
description: CNN's Sam Kiley reports from Ileret, Kenya, where thousands are dealing with one of the most severe droughts in decades as millions of children face starvation.

title: This East African nation is known for stability. But drought and rising prices are fueling insecurity
description: A maelstrom of howling brown dust engulfs travelers through Isiolo. A few weeks earlier, 11 people were reported to have been killed around the north Kenyan town in the space of 10 days.

title: Tiger Woods turned down $700-$800 million offer to join Saudi-backed LIV Golf series, says CEO
description: Tiger Woods turned down an offer worth approximately $700-$800 million to join the Saudi-backed LIV Golf series, according to the tour's CEO Greg Norman.

title: Expert warns of strong reaction to Pelosi's visit to Taiwan
description: US House Speaker Nancy Pelosi is expected to visit Taiwan despite stern warnings from Beijing. CNN's Selina Wang reports on China's escalation of threats and the history of Pelosi's critical stance toward the Chinese Communist government.

title: Kansas set to become first state to let voters weigh in on abortion in post-Roe US
description: Kansas on Tuesday will become the first state in the nation to let voters weigh in on abortion since the US Supreme Court overturned Roe v. Wade.

title: Ohio rivers are orange with pollution. An artist is cleaning them up
description: With rolling hills, forests and hiking trails, Southeast Ohio is a haven for lovers of the outdoors. Yet cutting through the landscape are countless orange-stained streams, colored by the iron oxide pollution that has seeped into them from abandoned coal mines.

title: India's weddings are changing -- and so is its bridalwear
description: More than a dozen leading designers showcased their creations at India Couture Week (ICW), offering a glimpse -- among much else -- at the bridalwear trends shaping one of the world's largest wedding markets.

title: For Asia's migrant workers, extreme heat is 'a matter of life and death'
description: It was mid-afternoon on a sweltering Saturday when Raj, a laborer from northwest India, started feeling dizzy as he hauled heavy bags of concrete mix and sand on a construction site in downtown Singapore.

title: Hawaii couple charged with assuming the identities of deceased children in Texas
description: A married couple in Hawaii has been indicted for allegedly living under the identities of dead children from Texas for decades and conspiring against the government, according to unsealed federal court records.

title: Cannabis cafes the latest addition to Thailand's tourism offerings
description: The RG420 cannabis cafe opened just four days ago in Khao San, an area of Bangkok popular with backpackers - and already it's crammed with customers.

title: Former DC officer in Trump's Jan. 6 motorcade speaks out
description: Former DC Metropolitan Police Sergeant Mark Robinson tells CNN's Don Lemon about his experience working in former President Donald Trump's motorcade during the January 6 riot.

title: 'The water was over my head': Man describes daring flood rescue
description: Nathan Day, a resident of Hindman, Kentucky, describes how he was able to rescue nine of his neighbors from the deadly flooding with no equipment in the dead of night.

title: White House warns China against escalations over Pelosi's trip to Taiwan
description: Biden administration officials are warning China not to take escalatory actions amid House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's prospective trip to Taiwan, emphasizing that the potential visit would not mark a shift in American foreign policy.

title: Indigenous lawmaker refers to Queen Elizabeth II as 'colonizing'
description: Indigenous lawmaker Lidia Thorpe referred to the Queen of England as "the colonizing Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II" while being sworn into Australia's Parliament.

title: Doorbell cam captures bear 'ringing' house's bell
description: A bear caught on doorbell cam appears to be ringing a South Carolina's woman's bell. CNN's Jeanne Moos reports.

title: 2 ultra-rare floods. Wildfire generating its own weather. This is the climate crisis
description:
• For Asia's migrant workers, extreme heat is a 'matter of life and death'
• Hundreds remain unaccounted for in Kentucky
• 'The water is coming!': First responders scramble to pull woman from flooding car

title: 'Justice has been delivered': Watch Biden's announcement on US killing of al Qaeda leader
description: President Joe Biden announces that the US has killed al Qaeda leader Ayman al-Zawahiri in a drone strike inside Afghanistan.
